advancements.lightmanscurrency.atm.descr: Craft an ATM Machine. You can use this to manually exchange coins and access your bank accounts
advancements.lightmanscurrency.atm.title: Now you're thinking with Banking
advancements.lightmanscurrency.banker_tr: Buy a currency-related item from a banker
advancements.lightmanscurrency.cash_regi: Craft a cash register so that players can interact with all of your nearby traders at once!
advancements.lightmanscurrency.cashier_t: Buy something for coins from a cashier
advancements.lightmanscurrency.coin_mint: Craft a Coin Mint so that you can mint your own coins
advancements.lightmanscurrency.enchanted: Enchant your wallet with the Coin Magnet enchantment
advancements.lightmanscurrency.event.cho: Play during a special holiday! Unlocks the ability to use chocolate coins as money
advancements.lightmanscurrency.event.chr: Played during a very jolly time!
advancements.lightmanscurrency.event.val: Played during the celebration of love
advancements.lightmanscurrency.jar_of_su: WHY DID IT HAVE TO BE SOUP!?
advancements.lightmanscurrency.netherite: Craft a netherite wallet, the largest and most resilient wallet around!
advancements.lightmanscurrency.network_t: Craft a network trader so that you can sell your items to anyone, anywhere!
advancements.lightmanscurrency.root.desc: Collecting wealth and trading with players
advancements.lightmanscurrency.specialty: Craft a specialty item trader. Be careful, as they have special rules limiting how their trades are defined
Craft a Trading Terminal. This will let you access network traders from anywhere
advancements.lightmanscurrency.trader.de: Craft any Trader so that you can trade with your friends!
advancements.lightmanscurrency.trader_in: Craft a trader interface so that you can automate trading or restocking with a network trader!
advancements.lightmanscurrency.trading_c: Craft a Trading Core! These are needed to make trading machines to trade from
advancements.lightmanscurrency.wallet_cr: Craft your first wallet. You can use these to store your coins!

tooltip.lightmanscurrency.atm.1: Can exchange coins for other coins of higher or lower values
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.atm.2: Can deposit or withdraw coins from any bank account you have access to
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.atm.3: Can transfer money from your account to another player or teams account
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.beta: Feature in beta stage. May have issues!
Can be used to linke and interact with multiple local traders from the same menu
Crouch & Interact with a trader to register
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.coin_jar.2: When placed, up to 64 coins can be inserted by interacting with the jar while holding a coin
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.coin_jar.3: If mined with silk touch the jar will drop with the coins still inside
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.coin_jar.4: If mined without silk touch the jar will break and its contents will be dropped instead
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.coin_jar.color: Can be dyed in a crafting table
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.coinmint.melta: Can melt coins back into their base materials
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.coinmint.minta: Can mint coins from their base materials
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.interface.item: Can be used to automatically purchase or sell items from any network item trader
Can be used to automatically drain or restock items remotely to/from any item trader you have access to
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.interface.onli: On even if Owner is Offline
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.ownable.anarch: Server is in Anarchy Mode. Block will not be break-protected!
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.owner_mode.man: Switch to Manual Player Input Mode
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.pass: Will not be consumed by Paygates
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.paygate.2: Can be used to trigger a redstone signal for a price
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.paygate.3: Can be linked to a ticket for easier customer interactions
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.persistent.add: Create a Persistent Auction with the given data
Create a Persistent Trader with a copy of this traders trades & name.
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.slot_machine.u: Slot Machine is not yet set up!
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.smithing_templ: Redstone or Copper to Netherite Materials
Can be placed and used to collect taxes from trader sales within an area
Can only be activated by an admin!
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.team.name: Name
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.terminal.1: Can access Network Traders remotely from any location
Can be used to print unique Master and Slave tickets
Tickets can be used with the Paygate, or used was coupons for barter trades
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.trade.item.nbt: NBT is NOT enforced. Item may have unexpected NBT data
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.trade.item.shi: Hold SHIFT & Click to access Item Settings
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.trade_rule.fre: Forgets who has received their free sample(s) so that they may receive it again
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.trade_rule.pla: Clears the memory of how many trades have been handled
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.trader.auction: Will cancel the auction. The latest bid will be refunded, and your items will be returned to your inventory
Will cancel the auction. The latest bid will be refunded, and your items will be sent to your storage
If enabled, any bids made within the last 5 minutes
of the auctions timer will reset the remaining
Enable if you wish to avoid last second bid-snatching
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.trader.item.3: Can be used to Sell, Purchase, or Barter items with other players
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.trader.item.ar: Can be used to Sell, Purchase, or Barter armor pieces with other players
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.trader.item.bo: Can be used to Sell, Purchase, or Barter books with other players
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.trader.item.ti: Can be used to Sell, Purchase, or Barter tickets and ticket materials with other players
A master ticket is required in order to sell tickets
Tickets being sold can consume ticket materials from storage to print a new ticket for the customer
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.trader.network: Can be used to Sell, Purchase, or Barter items with other players
Accessible from any location via the Trading Terminal
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.trader.paygate: Give Ticket Stubs to the Customer
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.trader.setting: Returns the trader to its item form but retains the trader's current state once the block is placed
Hold SHIFT to keep the trader accessible after pickup
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.trader.slot_ma: Can be used to Sell owner-defined random Items or Money to other players
with owner-defined odds of receiving each loot pool
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.upgrade.bank: Allows the Money Chest to automatically deposit or withdraw coins from a selected bank account
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.upgrade.coin_e: Allows the Money Chest to automatically exchange coins upon insertion
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.upgrade.hopper: Allows the block to collect inputs from its neighboring containers
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.upgrade.magnet: Allows the Money Chest to collect coin items up to %sm away
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.upgrade.networ: Makes a trader visible from a trading terminal
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.upgrade.securi: Allows the Money Chest to be protected from destruction by other players
Also blocks container access from other players
Requires set-up, will not have an owner defined automatically
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.upgrade.speed: Decreases the delay between interactions by %s ticks
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.wallet.bank_ac: Can deposit or withdraw coins to/from your bank account in the UI
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.wallet.exchang: Compress Coins to Highest Value Coinage
Can exchange coins manually in the UI
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.wallet.key_bin: Press [%s] while equipped to access your wallet
tooltip.lightmanscurrency.wallet.pickup: Automatically collects any coins that you pick up
Can collect coins up to %sm away
